00008 #include "tfilehandler.h"
00009 
00010 /**
00011  * Filename of the test file.
00012  */
00013 QString gFilename = QString ("fh-test.txt");
00014 
00015 /** File Create Method
00016  *  @brief This method tries to create a file for testing the "FileHandler" class.
00017  *  @author Efstathios Xatzikiriakidis
00018  */
00019 void
00020 TFileHandler::createFile ()
00021 {
00022   QFile file (gFilename);
00023 
00024   if (!file.open (QIODevice::WriteOnly))
00025   {
00026     QFAIL ("Fail: file cannot created.");
00027   }
00028   else
00029   {
00030     file.close ();
00031   }
00032 }
00033 
00034 /** File Exists Test Method
00035  *  @brief This method tests if the "FileHandler" class can check that a file exists.
00036  *  @author Efstathios Xatzikiriakidis
00037  */
00038 void
00039 TFileHandler::isFileExist ()
00040 {
00041   FileHandler fh;
00042 
00043   QVERIFY (fh.isFileExist (gFilename) == true);
00044 }
00045 
00046 /** Remove File Test Method
00047  *  @brief This method tests if the "FileHandler" class can remove a file.
00048  *  @author Efstathios Xatzikiriakidis
00049  */
00050 void
00051 TFileHandler::removeFile ()
00052 {
00053   FileHandler fh;
00054 
00055   QVERIFY (fh.removeFile(gFilename) == true);
00056 }

00058 QTEST_MAIN (TFileHandler)
